scripts.push: git add . ; git commit -m 'fix' ; git push -u origin master --force
scripts.deploy: npm run fix ; mkdocs build ; npm run push
scripts.clean_cll: cd src/cll ; find . -type f -name '*.xml' -exec rm {} + ; find . -type d -name 'dtd' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type d -name 'xml' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type f -name '*.out' -exec rm {} + ; find . -type f -name '*.new' -exec rm {} + ; find . -type d -name '*_epub' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type f -name '*.xml-*' -exec rm {} + ; find . -type d -name 'epub-xhtml' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type d -name 'diff_new_xhtml_section_chunks' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type d -name 'diff_*_chapter_chunks' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type d -name 'diff_old_*' -exec rm -rf {} + ; find . -type f -name '*.done' -exec rm {} + ; cd ../../
scripts.prune: npm run clean_cll ; npm run fix ; git checkout --orphan newBranch ; git add -A ; git commit -m 'init' ;git branch -D master ; git branch -m master ; git push -f origin master ; git gc --aggressive --prune=all ; npm run deploy
